TopicTitle: So I got to Jool in a rocket designed for the Mun...

Articles.Content:
So.

Today I was playing KSP and decided to go to Minmus, as I had landed on the Mun yesterday.

When I was going to Minmus, I was using a rocket meant for the Mun.

So, during my maneuver placing...

I missed Minmus.

So I said, screw it. We're going to Eve.

I screwed that up so too so I said Screw it, we're going to Duna.

I screwed that up too.

So I just decided LET'S GO TO JOOL.

And I made it.

https://imgur.com/a/T4SQe

Cool.

Most Spacecraft in KSP have way top much Delta-V for the task they are supposed to do.
